sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import {
  Box,
  Text,
  Flex,
  Accordion,
  Center,
  Avatar,
  Badge,
  Checkbox,
} from "@mantine/core";

const CategoryList = ({
  setBoxVisible,
  boxVisible,
  setBoxVisible2,
  boxVisible2,
  setBoxVisible3,
  boxVisible3,
  setBoxVisible4,
  boxVisible4,
  setProductCustomize,
  setProductCustomize2,
}) => {
  const [iconCheckVisible, setIconCheckVisible] = useState(false);
  const [iconCheckVisible2, setIconCheckVisible2] = useState(false);
  const [iconCheckVisible3, setIconCheckVisible3] = useState(false);
  const [iconCheckVisible4, setIconCheckVisible4] = useState(false);

  const handleCategoryWithProductClick = () => {
    setBoxVisible(!boxVisible);
    setIconCheckVisible(!iconCheckVisible);
  };

  return (
    <Accordion.Item value="category-list">
      <Accordion.Control bg="indigo.2">
        <Center>
          <Text fw={700}>Category List</Text>
        </Center>
      </Accordion.Control>
      <Accordion.Panel bg="gray.2">
        <Box
          mb="xs"
          bg="#FFFFFF"
          style={{ cursor: "pointer" }}
          onClick={handleCategoryWithProductClick}
        >
          <Flex
            h={{ base: "auto", md: 100 }}
            justify="center"
            align="center"
            direction={{ base: "column", md: "row" }}
            gap="sm"
          >
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://blogassets.leverageedu.com/blog/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/02232228/BSc-Electronics.png"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Electronics</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://hnsfpau.imgix.net/5/images/detailed/240/TH-32JS610Z.01.jpg?fit=fill&bg=0FFF&w=1500&h=844&auto=format,compress"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Accessories</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://i0.wp.com/post.healthline.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/Best_Baby_Clothes_1296x728.png?w=1155&h=1528"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Clothing</Text>
            </Flex>
            <Flex justify="center" align="center" direction="column">
              <Avatar
                variant="filled"
                radius="sm"
                size="lg"
                color="yellow"
                src="https://media.gq.com/photos/63eba1b2275d2fef78a425c2/16:9/w_2560%2Cc_limit/nike-running-shoes-streakfly-invincible.jpg"
              />
              <Text size="xs">Shoes</Text>
            </Flex>
            {iconCheckVisible && (
              <Flex h={{ base: "auto", md: `100%` }}>
                <Checkbox defaultChecked />
              </Flex>
            )}
          </Flex>
        </Box>
      </Accordion.Panel>
    </Accordion.Item>
  );
};

export default CategoryList;
